category-def.name: CPN Tools Toolkit
category-def.label: CPN Tools Toolkit
category-def.description: Plug-ins to create CPN Tools files from EMF. In addition, it provides capabilities to layout and serialize the EMF-compatible Petri nets into the "normative" CPN Tools XML format.

category-def.name: CPN Tools Toolkit SDK
category-def.label: CPN Tools Toolkit SDK
category-def.description: Plug-ins supporting the development of tools that rely on the CPN Tools toolkit. May install SDK components from the Eclipse site.
